title: Power Mech Projects bags order worth Rs 563 crore to construct nuclear power plant from BHEL
description: Power Mech Projects announced securing a Rs 563 crore order from BHEL to build a nuclear power plant at Kaiga Atomic Power Project, marking its entry into the critical nuclear sector. The project will cover various civil, structural, and architectural works for units 5 and 6, contributing to India's sustainable energy goals.
